rules.description: ANSI Fat Z for Colemak CAWS Extend
Caps Lock and Right ⌘ to Extend toggle
Fix undo for ANSI Colemak CAWS Extend
Mouse button one on N key for ANSI Colemak CAWS Extend
Fix scrolling direction in Colemak Extend
Implements the Extend layer created by DreymaR as documented in https://dreymar.colemak.org/layers-extend.html, with some modifications.

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to set dark mode to not dark mode'

rules.description: spacebar to ⌃⌥. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Caps Lock to F13 and ⌘ + Caps Lock to F14
